summary: Provides a Keras layer that computes the maximum value across the height and width dimensions of a 4‑D tensor, reducing each channel to a single scalar (or a 1×1 spatial map when keepdims is true).
business_intent: Allows neural networks to compress spatial feature maps into a compact per‑channel descriptor, preserving the most salient activation for each channel and simplifying the transition to dense layers or other downstream components.
